sentences.en: An analysis of antimicrobial susceptibility and isolation of pathogenic vibrio in brine.
sentences.cn: 海水;弧菌;抗菌药物;药敏试验.

sentences.en: Asthmatics have an increased susceptibility to viral illnesses.
sentences.cn: 气喘病人对病毒性病变的敏感性增加了.

sentences.en: Gardeners classify plants accrdiring to their life - duration and frost susceptibility.
sentences.cn: 园艺学家根据植物的生命长短以及对霜害的敏感性去分类.

sentences.en: I knew I would have to be careful not to offend their susceptibilities .
sentences.cn: 我知道我得小心，不能伤害他们脆弱的感情。

sentences.en: Limted evidence suggests susceptibility in deer and swine.
sentences.cn: 有限的证据认为鹿和猪有易感性.

sentences.en: Objective To observe susceptibility of Streptococcus mutans biofilms to erythromycin.
sentences.cn: 目的观察变形链球菌生物膜对红霉素敏感性.

sentences.en: Others worry about the IASB's finances and its susceptibility to outside influence.
sentences.cn: 其它人担心国际会计准则委员会的财务状况且害怕其受外界影响.

sentences.en: Susceptibility to heat damage is influenced by genetically controlled factors.
sentences.cn: 对热害的敏感性则受遗传所控制的因素的影响.

sentences.en: That suggests the variant promotes susceptibility to bipolar disorder.
sentences.cn: 这就说明正是这种变体诱发了躁郁症.

sentences.en: The effect of electron - lattice coupling on the nonlinear susceptibility is explained.
sentences.cn: 说明了电子 - 晶格耦合对非线性极化的影响.

sentences.en: The susceptibility of plants to such infections is the result of many factors.
sentences.cn: 植物对于这种侵染的敏感程度是多种因素作用的结果.

sentences.en: The susceptibility rates of PRI , DOX, JOS , TET , ERY and OFL were 99.4 %, 91.5 %, 89.7 %, 80.0 %, 49.7 % and 25.5 %, respectively.
sentences.cn: 药敏结果显示:敏感率原始霉素99.4% 、 强力霉素91.5% 、 交沙霉素89.7% 、 四环素80.0% 、 红霉素49.7% 、 氧氟沙星25.5%.

sentences.en: The temperature - dependent magnetic susceptibility curve showed that there was no Curie - Weiss behavior.
sentences.cn: 测得的磁化率随温度变化曲线表明得到的纳米线具有顺磁性.

sentences.en: This susceptibility might not be due merely to ethnic genetic differences.
sentences.cn: 这种易感性可能不仅仅是由于民族遗传差异.

sentences.en: To study the association between TLR 9 gene polymorphism and lung cancer susceptibility.
sentences.cn: 研究TLR9基因多态性与肺癌易感性的关系.

sentences.en: Type of irrigation system and its susceptibility to plugging or other problems.
sentences.cn: 灌溉系统类型及其对阻塞或其它问题敏感性.

words.tran_cn: 易受影响的；易感动的；容许…的

trans.tran_cn: 易受影响或损害的状态，感受性，感情（脆弱之处），磁化系数
trans.tran_en: someone’s feelings, especially when they are easily offended or upset
